name: FACEOFF! (FinnTess)
description:
Game created during the 11th edition of the Creative Jam

FACEOFF! is a competitive rhythm game designed to be played and projected on a ice hockey rink. The game is played with voice inputs timed with the music and incoming discs in-game.

Team DiscoStar members and roles

  • Claudia Ferland - Sound designer
  • Olivier Grandmont - Programmer
  • Vincent Gingras - Programmer
  • Nicolas Crevier - 3D artist
  • Lance L'archevêque - 3D artist
  • Dominic Lachance-Robidoux - Game designer
  • Gabriel Bradley - Game designer

Controls

  • Red Team
    • "HEY!" - Q key
    • "HO!" - A key
  • Blue Team
    • "HEY!" - Up arrow
    • "HO!" - Down arrow
